ygData.subject: Merry Christmas! Happy New Year!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Like to wish every one a Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! I am off on holidays for 2 weeks, so I won t be able to waste my work time reading this list for a
ygData.messageBody:
Like to wish every one a Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! I am off on
holidays for 2 weeks, so I won't be able to waste my work time reading this
list for a while :) Thanks for all the cool info and tips, and look forward
to reading when I get back.

Hope we can all tear oursleves away from EQ at least on Christmas Day to
spend some time with our families ( I know it will be hard, but come on,
we're strong) :)

Any hoo, hope to see you in game!

Felize Navidad
Joyeux Noel
Happy Kwanza
Happy Channukah (sp?)
Good Ramadan

Happy Y2K!

Brytewing, Cleric of Bristlebane, The Rathe.

-----Original Message-----
From: Rob Berryhill [mailto:racefan@...]
Sent: 1999/12/23 3:12 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] RE: Another Question


From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>

It does 585 for me at 44.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
SCARAB on Solusek Ro

> From: James Zhang <jlin@...>
>
> Actually banish only des 565 or so when you first get it at level 44.
